review: I love the speed and the new update with autoplay next episode is great. I can't wait until the fire stick comes in so I can try it out against the Fire TV. My one main complaint (and I called tech support on) is the font size cannot be changed. I have a 32" TV in the bed room (about 12' x 16') we dont watch TV often in there, but I cannot see the menus from the bed.
author: Diamends

review: This is a great streaming device.  The quad core processor performs very well, giving very quick response times and navigation.  The voice search is fantastic.  However, I rate it four stars and not five because, as others have pointed out, the voice search only covers Amazon Instant Video.  We have been a Roku household for some time and like the Fire TV just as much.
author: Patrick

review: I love my Fire TV and will soon cancel my $100 a month cable. One month of no cable pays for my Fire TV. Thank you Amazon Prime.
